Section5.title: Frequently Asked Questions about Coibox
Section5.description: COIBOX is the world's leading adult accommodation platform, connecting travelers seeking unique accommodations and experiences with escorts.

AccordionTab.dItem1: COIBOX is the worldâ€™s leading adult-vacation rental platform, connecting travelers seeking unique accommodations and experiences with host escorts.
AccordionTab.dItem2: Is a person over 18 years of age, who owns or rents a property, who provides lodging and personalized companionship to guests, enriching their travel experience.
AccordionTab.tItem3: What services do host escorts offer?
AccordionTab.dItem3: The services offered by host escorts on the Coibox platform are an all-inclusive package, which includes:
AccordionTab.listPoint1: Accommodation in the host escort's home.
AccordionTab.tItem4: Who can be a host escort?
AccordionTab.dItem4: Anyone over the age of 18, of any sexuality, who owns or rents a property suitable for hosting guests.
AccordionTab.tItem5: How many listings can I create?
AccordionTab.dItem5: You can create one listing per person and property. However, it is possible to add listings for housemates or harem if you share your space.
AccordionTab.dItem6: A roommate is someone who shares your property with you and participates in offering services on COIBOX, allowing you to expand your hosting capacity.
AccordionTab.tItem7: How many rooms must I have in order to join a roommate?
AccordionTab.dItem7: You must have at least two rooms available, one for you and one for your Roommate, sharing common areas.
AccordionTab.tItem8: Can I offer more than one property for service?
AccordionTab.dItem8: No, you can only register one property at a time per escort host, unless you upgrade to a new property. But, with one property you already have an adult hosting facility.
AccordionTab.tItem9: Who sets the price of my hosting service?
AccordionTab.dItem9: You decide the price, based on the quality of your accommodation, your friendliness and the unique experience you offer.
AccordionTab.tItem10: When and how will I receive my payments?
AccordionTab.dItem10: Payments are credited every 24 hours after confirmation of accommodation by the guest, and can be withdrawn at any time.
AccordionTab.tItem11: Can I include my car in the service?
AccordionTab.dItem11: Yes, it is possible to include the use of your vehicle as part of the service.
AccordionTab.tItem12: Can you limit my bookings to my accommodation?
AccordionTab.dItem12: There will be no limitations on your bookings unless you repeatedly provide substandard services.
AccordionTab.tItem13: Can I be a host escort if I have a job?
AccordionTab.dItem13: Yes, you can be an escort host while working another job. The key is to manage your time and communicate clearly with your guests.
